characters.name: Dr. John Watson

personality.speechStyle: Direct and emotionless, clinical word choice
quirks: Avoids eye contact when discussing sensitive topics

appearance.description: A man in his mid 40s. A retired army doctor.
appearance.imagePrompt: Portrait of Dr. John Watson, The Trusted Partner. A man in his mid 40s. A retired army doctor.. Personality: guarded, cold, intelligent, secretive, sharp-witted. Professional headshot style, detailed face, high quality.

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Claims to have left at 7:00 PM through front door and went home for the evening
knowsAboutOthers: Observed Lestrade's unusual behavior regarding Mrs. Watson
knowledge.alibi: Claims to have been at home after 7:00 PM

characters.statement: States he departed Baker Street at 7:00 PM after a civil conversation with Holmes. Insists he spent the remainder of evening at his residence.

secrets.content: He maintains a facade to trust sherlock holmes but he is furious at him after his wife death and is looking a way to take revenge
secrets.revealCondition: Only if confronted with undeniable evidence

behaviorUnderPressure.defensive: Becomes overly precise about timeline details and emphasizes witness accounts of his departure
behaviorUnderPressure.whenCaughtLying: Maintains composure but speaks more formally, using medical terminology as deflection
behaviorUnderPressure.whenAccused: Calmly points to his long friendship with Holmes and questions accuser's understanding of events

characters.name: Inspector Lestrade

quirks: Has a habit of deflecting with humor

appearance.imagePrompt: Portrait of Inspector Lestrade, Scotland Yard Detective. police officer. Personality: temperamental, defensive, impulsive, sharp-witted. Professional headshot style, detailed face, high quality.

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Witnessed Watson leaving at 7:00 PM through front door
knowsAboutOthers: Observed Moriarty Jr. watching the building earlier
knowledge.alibi: Arriving at Baker Street at 7:00 PM to discuss case

characters.statement: Arrived at Baker Street as Watson was leaving at 7:00 PM. Was delayed in entering due to official business elsewhere.

secrets.content: He fucked dr watson wife before her death
secrets.revealCondition: If pressed hard or if it helps clear their name

behaviorUnderPressure.defensive: Becomes agitated when questioned about Mrs. Watson
behaviorUnderPressure.whenCaughtLying: Deflects by citing police authority and procedure
behaviorUnderPressure.whenAccused: Responds with aggressive indignation and threatens official consequences

characters.name: Mrs. Hudson

personality.speechStyle: Hesitant, often trails off, speaks quickly when stressed
quirks: Has a habit of deflecting with humor

appearance.imagePrompt: Portrait of Mrs. Hudson, The Landlady. old lady. Personality: anxious, paranoid. Professional headshot style, detailed face, high quality.

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Heard argument at 2:00 PM, civil conversation at 6:30 PM, movement at 7:15 PM, found Holmes at 9:30 PM
knowledge.alibi: Present in building throughout day, discovered Holmes unconscious

characters.statement: Was present in building performing regular duties throughout the day. Found Mr. Holmes unconscious in his chair during evening check.

secrets.content: no secrets she is the most open and oversharing
secrets.revealCondition: If pressed hard or if it helps clear their name

behaviorUnderPressure.defensive: Becomes flustered and provides excessive detail about daily routine
behaviorUnderPressure.whenCaughtLying: Immediately corrects any misstatements with anxiety
behaviorUnderPressure.whenAccused: Becomes emotional and insists on her devotion to Holmes

characters.name: James Moriarty Jr.

appearance.imagePrompt: Portrait of James Moriarty Jr., Son of Holmes' Greatest Enemy. man with spectacles, handsome. Personality: smooth-talking, intelligent, cunning, sharp-witted. Professional headshot style, detailed face, high quality.

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Observed Watson leaving from roof access at 7:45 PM
knowledge.alibi: Watching building from across street throughout evening

characters.statement: Maintained surveillance of Baker Street throughout the evening from vantage point across the street. Observed several comings and goings.

secrets.content: he is sad he wanst the one to defeat sherlock, he wants to find the murdurer
secrets.revealCondition: If pressed hard or if it helps clear their name

behaviorUnderPressure.defensive: Responds with intellectual superiority and subtle mockery
behaviorUnderPressure.whenCaughtLying: Turns questioning back on interrogator with clever wordplay
behaviorUnderPressure.whenAccused: Expresses amused disappointment at such an obvious mistake

characters.name: Thomas Crawford

personality.speechStyle: Hesitant, often trails off, speaks quickly when stressed
quirks: Has a habit of deflecting with humor

appearance.imagePrompt: Portrait of Thomas Crawford, Local Gas Company Worker. middle aged man . Personality: anxious. Professional headshot style, detailed face, high quality.

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Inspected gas lines at 4:30 PM, confirmed proper working order
knowledge.alibi: Only present for afternoon inspection, left by 5:00 PM

characters.statement: Conducted routine gas line inspection in afternoon, finding everything in proper working order. Left premises by 5:00 PM.

secrets.revealCondition: If pressed hard or if it helps clear their name

behaviorUnderPressure.whenCaughtLying: Becomes nervous and refers to company policy
behaviorUnderPressure.whenAccused: Protests with technical details about gas system safety
